name: Decrowned
description:
Enjoy! ^^

This is a completely fair and easy game. 

Enjoy! 

___________________________________________________________________________

Controls: 

(Disclaimer: The game is made to be played with an Xbox controller, but can also be played with keyboard ^^)

Controller Controls:
- Left Joystick: moving
- Y-button: jumping
- Right Trigger: shooting
- A-button: activate/select

Keyboard Controls:
- WASD: moving
- Space: jumping
- Left Shift: shooting
- Left Ctrl: activate/select
